channel.title: Chinese entertainment sector on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Chinese entertainment sector on FinanClub

item.title: IQ
item.description: score:-8 Chances: Strong box office performance of films released on iQIYI’s Cloud Cinema. Expansion of offline parent-child theme park for IP commercialization. Partnership with PubMatic to maximize revenue through programmatic advertising. Recognition and awards received from industry events, showcasing content quality. Continuous commitment to empowering the Chinese anime industry’s growth.
